
## [The ICANS clinical trial](https://clinicaltrials.gov/study/NCT03801850?id=NCT03801850&rank=1)

::: {.text-left}
**Objective:** Study morphological changes in breast during radiotherapy and their effect on
administrated dose.
:::

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="70%"}
- Conducted from 02/22/2018 to 05/07/2020 at the Centre Paul Strauss
- 60 patients, 33 irradiation sessions
- Using a hand-held, optical, non-ionizing surface scanner
- 11 additional surfaces, acquired before, during and after treatment
:::

::: {.column width="30%"}
![*Artec EVA hand-held scanner*](./images/medical_context/artec_eva_scanner_hand.png){width=50%}
:::
:::
